item.title: Using Calcdate
item.description: CALCDATE should only be used with DateFormula variables. Alternatively the string should be enclosed using the <> symbols. Bad code IF ReservEntry."Expected Receipt Date" \> CALCDATE('-' + FORMAT("Dampener (Time)") + FirstDate) THEN Good code IF ReservEntry."Expected Receipt Date" \> CALCDATE('<-' + FORMAT("Dampener (Time)") + FirstDate + '\>') THEN
